meanings.sent1: The new car was registrable with the local authorities.
meanings.sent2: Only items meeting the specific criteria are considered registrable.
meanings.sent3: The puppy thought it was registrable to join the cat club.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was so bright and warm, it was registrable from across the room.
meanings.sent5: The idea of a flying car seemed as registrable as a unicorn.

meanings.sent1: The completed form was finally registrable for submission.
meanings.sent2: The registrable candidates were invited for the final interview.
meanings.sent3: The banana peel found itself in a registrable position for the race.
meanings.sent4: His determination made him as registrable for success as anyone could be.
meanings.sent5: The treasure map was as clear and registrable as a neon sign.
